name: Chroma Swap
description:
Chroma Swap is a Puzzle platform game, based on switching among some coloured cubes and using some mechanics, to resolve puzzles. Try it, to have a better description!

It has got 40 single player levels and 10 for a short local cooperative mode.

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS

MINIMUM:

CPURAM
HDDGPU
pentium g620 or an AMD a4 6300
1gb
67 mb of free space
integrated, it doesn't requie a dedicated one

This was my first game, made by one person in Unity, it took me a year to develop it. Leave a commet saying what you think of it.
